stimulusHtml: The two kneeling figures in the panel on the left are included because they represent

features.html: Image © The Metropolitan Museum of Art/Image Source © Art Resource, NY

choicesHtml: the patrons who commissioned the altarpiece for private use in their home
the saints whose relics were venerated at the altar for which the work was created
figures in a biblical story that happened before the scene depicted in the central panel
philosophers from classical antiquity who foretold the story of the Annunciation
